short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A collection of addictive, fun and free mini-games to play online in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a collection of manually selected, fun and quality browser mini-games that you can play online in your browser.

Click the extension icon in your browser to open the games list.
